description:
Take part in the new adventurous TV show! We designed unique puzzles and locations special for you. Prove yourself worthy of the love of the audience!

“Artifact Seekers” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests. 

Have you ever dreamed of fame and glory? Your time has come! Try your hand at living under the spotlight in the brand new TV show — Artifact Seekers. The whole season of adventures is ready to impress you.
Take on other players to win the love of the audience. Explore carefully designed locations, talk to the helpers, and solve challenging puzzles. Earn as many stars as possible using your intelligence, and reach the quest goals showing perseverance. The viewers of the show will love it!

- Choose a couple, that will go to the goal together. Think outside the box, show ingenuity, and the victory is in your pocket!
- Strive for excellence to take the top spot among other players.
- Explore whole worlds with each new episode, carefully collecting local curiosities.
- Enjoy stunning locations and beautiful soundtracks
- Solve dozens of puzzles and test yourself in exciting mini-games
